attributes.additional_details: We must remove this man as he is slaughtering the nhs to the point were it will no longer survive he is enslaving doctors to a contract which is beyond humain and he is meant to be speaking for the people and in this case he is not speaking for any of us and we will prove this with the petition for Jeremy hunt to vacate his position.
attributes.background: Human rights has been damaged because of this man and it needs to be fixed with the removal of Jeremy hunt

rejection.details: We can't accept petitions about appointments. If you're concerned about a particular policy or decision that's the responsibility of Government or Parliament, you could start a petition about that.
